fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Motivation: Whenever you Kill a player, draw 1 satcheled card. 
- Final Strike: When you die, choose to privately deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to a target at the end of the phase. Must be chosen by the following phase of your death.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Power: Pick a player. If they do not win with you, gain a satcheled Impale?! at the beginning of the following phase (Uncertain). [2 uses, 3 CD, Unique, Unlocks D2]  
- Divination: Turn all cards in your hand into random attacking cards, keeping the modifiers. [1 use, Unique] 
- Aggression: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all Chaos and Outsiders who oppose your goal.
